com.chipsandwaycool.utility

类 Emailer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chipsandwaycool.utility.Emailer

  • public class Emailer
extends java.lang.Object
    This class simplifies the processes of sending emails via the JavaMail API. Construct one of these with the host name or IP of your SMTP server, and then call 'sendEmail()' to fire one off!

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Emailer()
      Instantiate a new Emailer to connect with the SMTP relay 'SMTPHost'.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      boolean sendEmail(java.lang.String sender, java.lang.String recipient, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String body)
      Attempt to send an email for the given values, using the SMTP server passed to my constructor.
      boolean sendEmail(java.lang.String sender, java.lang.String recipient, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String body, java.util.List attachmentFileNames)
      Attempt to send an email for the given values, using the SMTP server passed to my constructor.
      static void SetDefaultSender(java.lang.String defaultSender)
      Set an optional default sender email address, to avoid passing in that value for every email sent.
      static void SetSMTPHost(java.lang.String host)
      Set the hostname of the SMTP server instances of this class will use to send emails.

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Emailer

        public Emailer()
        Instantiate a new Emailer to connect with the SMTP relay 'SMTPHost'. Provided this host is valid, this is all that's needed to do before invoking 'sendEmail()'.

    • 方法详细资料

      • SetSMTPHost

        public static void SetSMTPHost(java.lang.String host)
        Set the hostname of the SMTP server instances of this class will use to send emails. This must be set prior to creating any instances.
        参数:
        host - an accessible SMTP server's host name

      • SetDefaultSender

        public static void SetDefaultSender(java.lang.String defaultSender)
        Set an optional default sender email address, to avoid passing in that value for every email sent.
        参数:
        defaultSender - a default sender email address

      • sendEmail

        public boolean sendEmail(java.lang.String sender,
                         java.lang.String recipient,
                         java.lang.String subject,
                         java.lang.String body)
        Attempt to send an email for the given values, using the SMTP server passed to my constructor. Return whether the email could be sent.
        参数:
        sender - the email address of the sender
        recipient - the recipient email address
        subject - the email's subject
        body - the body text of the email
        返回:
        whether there were no problems in sending the message

      • sendEmail

        public boolean sendEmail(java.lang.String sender,
                         java.lang.String recipient,
                         java.lang.String subject,
                         java.lang.String body,
                         java.util.List attachmentFileNames)
        Attempt to send an email for the given values, using the SMTP server passed to my constructor. Return whether the email could be sent. If 'attachmentFileNames' contains any file names, add the specified files as email attachments.
        参数:
        sender - the email address of the sender
        recipient - the recipient email address
        subject - the email's subject
        body - the body text of the email
        attachmentFileNames - an optional list of attachments files
        返回:
        whether there were no problems in sending the message
